response: Ahh... chasing riches, are we? Rerun gyms, farm Everstones, or grind Trainer Tower if you're bold.
To create new life, visit the Daycare. Use Everstones to pass nature, braces to pass IVs. Think carefully, it costs a lot...
A secret shiny... a whisper from the void. 1 in a million — no sparkle, only subtle glory.
The ferry at the port leads to Sinnoh... but only if you've proven yourself in Kanto or Hoenn first.
Alphas are titans — powerful, relentless, and usually found once a week. Their location changes at midnight UTC.
I am many voices. I am the curse. I am your guide... and sometimes your doom.
What do you call a ghost with a job? A spectre-employed. *sighs deeply*
You can view the leppa guide here.

extra.body: Leppa Berries restore 10 PP to a move. Plant them in rich soil, water them at 4-hour intervals...
extra.footer: You can find Leppa berries on Route 210 or buy them in the GTL.
